title: How to complete class 11 along with class 12 - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all u havnt specify about which stream u r talking about… i m assuming it SCIENCE STREAM non medical bc i belong to that… If u have just started ur 12th session (april) then u have ample time in summer holidays to finish base of 11 and learn for jee and other entrance exam from 11th class syllabus. Also find chapter of class 12th which are liked with class 11.. like in chem chemicap bonding, organic chem etc… Focus on that chap first .. I will suggest u to first focus on 12th then go for 11th.. as priority should be 12th… Do not pay attention on 11th after sept at all because after that just focus on boards….. Alll te best
